content: chunky wool hat instructions using the long-tail method cast on 72 stitches using the 5 0mm by a twist of yarn needle join your work in the round being careful not to twist your stitches and place a marker at the beginning of the round ribbing *k1 p1* to bor marker sm repeat * to * until work reaches 7 6 cm 3 body switch to a 6 0mm needle knit each row until work reaches 11 5 cm 4 5 decreasing when stitches are too tight on magic loop switch to dpns r1 *k2tog k10* repeat * to * until bor marker sm r2 *k2tog k9* repeat * to * until bor marker sm r3 *k2tog k8* repeat * to * until bor marker sm r4 *k2tog k7* repeat * to * until bor marker sm r5 *k2tog k6* repeat * to * until bor marker sm r6 *k2tog k5* repeat * to * until bor marker sm r7 *k2tog k4* repeat * to * until bor marker sm r8 *k2tog k3* repeat * to * until bor marker sm r9 *k2tog k2* repeat * to * until bor marker sm the perfect 1 ball hat that knits up quickly but is still cozy and warm r10 *k2tog k1* repeat * to * until bor marker sm r11 *k2tog* repeat * to * until 6 stitches remain materials 1 ball of mode at rowan chunky wool 100g = 100m / 109y finishing 5 0mm us8 and 6 0mm us10 16 circular needles or 40 circular for cut yarn leaving at least a 6 tail using a darning needle weave the magic loop tail into remaining 6 stitches and pull to cinch together weave in any other 6 0mm us10 dpns ends you can choose to block the hat or just enjoy the coziness right away stitch marker s stay warm darning needle abbreviations bor = beginning of round sm = slip marker k= knit p = purl k2tog = knit two together 3915 31 st vernon bc www atwistofyarn com
